frontmatter.title: How to swap tokens
frontmatter.description: A guide on how to swap tokens on Ethereum.

items.title: 1. Connect your wallet to the decentralized exchange (DEX) of your choice
2. Select the pair of tokens you wish to swap
3. Enter the amount of tokens you want to trade and click swap
5. Wait for the transaction to be processed
Can I swap ETH for BTC from my wallet?
